sen.j: 橘元任（たちばな の もととう、生没年不詳）は、平安時代中期の官人・歌人。
sen.e: TACHIBANA no Mototo (date of birth and death unknown) was a government official (esp. one of low to medium rank) and a kajin (a waka poet) who lived in the mid-Heian period.
